body_html: This still happens on latest code, it seems that it tries to create the same device multiple times. Under gdb I found that multiple threads are calling BaseGPUDeviceFactory::CreateDevices simultaneously. Is this the desired behaviour?
body_text: This still happens on latest code, it seems that it tries to create the same device multiple times. Under gdb I found that multiple threads are calling BaseGPUDeviceFactory::CreateDevices simultaneously. Is this the desired behaviour?
body: This still happens on latest code, it seems that it tries to create the same device multiple times. Under gdb I found that multiple threads are calling `BaseGPUDeviceFactory::CreateDevices` simultaneously. Is this the desired behaviour?
